definition[0]: having a very powerful effect or influence on your body or mind
example[2]: Advertising is a potent force in showing smoking as a socially acceptable habit.
example[3]: A good company pension scheme remains a potent weapon for attracting staff.
example[4]: The treaty requires them to get rid of their most potent weapons.
definition[2]: a man who is potent is able to have sex or able to make a woman pregnant
